        <a href="#about">About</a>
        <a href="#anything">Speakers</a>

    <!-- main -->
     <main>

       </section>

       </audio>



     </main>

    <footer>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- INLINE CSS: IT IS TO ADD STYLING IN HTML , IN THE SAME TAG OR LINE
     using style attribute

    -->

    <h1 style="color: red;  background-color: yellow;">Hello This is Getting styled</h1>

    <p style="text-align: center; color: brown; ">Hello This is me without styl</p>

    <p>This is an example of Inline css</p>

</body>
</html>


 <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
<style>
 
 h1{
    text-align: center;
    color: blue;
 }

 div{
    border: 1px solid black;
    width: 500px;
    text-align: center;
    color: red;
 }


</style>

</head>
<body>
    <h1>Internal Css - Style tag</h1>

    <div>
        <h2>Web Developer</h2>
        <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">
        <p>John</p>
    </div>

    <p>HII GUYS I AM FROM INTERNAL CSS</p>
</body>
</html>




<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
    <!-- relation -->
</head>
<body>
    <h1>External Css - Sperate file</h1>
    <p>Hii i am styled with external css</p>
</body>
</html>
